data.actual_result: Emojis appear as improper colored circles until they are loaded
data.expected_result: When emojis are loading in the emoji picker, they should appear as dark grey circles as in regular keyboard emoji picker
data.short_description: In the Add Reaction emoji picker, emotes that haven't finished loading will appear as weird white plain circles
data.steps_to_repro: - Restart Discord app the cache is clean. Having a slow connection may also help.  - Switch to Dark theme - Go in a server with a lot of custom emojis - Long press on a message and Add Reaction (make sure you have perms to do so of course) - Scroll fast through the emoji list (way easier to notice)
